title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 606.5 - Soliciting and commercial activity
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 606.5 - Soliciting and commercial activity

State Regulations

No person shall stand in or upon the vehicular crossing or
any buildings or areas of the authority to solicit from or sell to any occupant
of any building or any vehicle upon the vehicular crossing, except with the
written permission of the authority. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
606.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
